sentences.en: 'I'm Ben Gunn, I am,'replied the maroon, wriggling like an eel in his embarrassment.
sentences.cn: “ 是的, 我是本-刚恩, ”这位放逐在荒滩上的水手答道, 一面不好意思地像鳗鱼一样扭动着身子.

sentences.en: A method for detecting florfenicol residue in eel muscle was established.
sentences.cn: 建立了鳗鱼肌肉中氟苯尼考残留的分析方法.

sentences.en: A method of detecting mebendazole residue in eel muscles was established.
sentences.cn: 建立鳗鱼体内甲苯咪唑残留的分析方法.

sentences.en: An eel held by the tail is not yet caught.
sentences.cn: 只抓住鳗鱼的尾巴还不算真正捉住了它.

sentences.en: As for oily fish, think salmon, mackerel anchovies, sardines and eel.
sentences.cn: 至于油鱼类, 可以考虑吃鲑鱼, 鲭鱼, 沙丁鱼和鳗鱼.

sentences.en: Beware of that peddler, for he is slippery as an eel.
sentences.cn: 当心那个小贩, 他油滑得很.

sentences.en: He is as slippery as an eel and simply refuses to be pinned down on anything.
sentences.cn: 他很圆滑,什么事情都不肯承担责任.

sentences.en: He used an eel spear to catch an eel.
sentences.cn: 他用一只捕鳗叉捕鳗鱼.

sentences.en: Holding an eel too fast is the way to let it escape.
It could an eel, but it could also be a snake.
sentences.cn: 可能是修鳗, 不过也有可能是条蛇.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To make full use of the resourus of eel.
sentences.cn: 目的: 充分利用鳗鱼资源.

sentences.en: OFFER ALL KINDS OF SPECIFIC ROASTED EEL , PRAWN, AND FILLET.
sentences.cn: 供应各种规格的高品质烤鳗鱼, 对虾,鱼片.

sentences.en: Rapid detection of sulfonamides in eel by Charm II Radioimmunoassay was studied.
sentences.cn: 本文探讨应用CharmII放射免疫分析方法检测鳗鱼中磺胺类药物残留.

sentences.en: She's as slippery as an eel.
The relationships between ambient temperature and ADMR, AME, EDM, EEL, TDMR, TME, plasma T 3 concentration were curvilinear.
sentences.cn: ADMR 、 AME 、 EDM 、 EEL 、 TDMR 、 TME 、 血浆中T_3浓度与环境温度的关系呈曲线型,其中EDM、 EEL、TDMR用对数曲线模拟较好.

words.tran_cn: 似鳗的；易滑脱的；滑头滑脑的

trans.tran_cn: 鳝鱼，鳗鱼，小线虫，精明油滑的人
trans.tran_en: a long thin fish that looks like a snake and can be eaten
